_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.10:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it
Another meditator who is skilled in doing what’s conducive to immersion but not in immersion itself
Another meditator who is unskilled in both immersion and doing what’s conducive to it
Another meditator who is skilled in both immersion and doing what’s conducive to it
